text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the Acer Nitro 5 AN515-51-522L 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 7th Gen 7300HQ (2.50 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is good, but I expected a bit more from the port selection on the Acer Nitro 5 AN515-51-522L 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 7th Gen 7300HQ (2.50 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Nitro 5 AN515-51-522L 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 7th Gen 7300HQ (2.50 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the Acer Nitro 5 AN515-51-522L 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 7th Gen 7300HQ (2.50 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Call of Duty: Warzone, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Acer Nitro 5 AN515-51-522L 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 7th Gen 7300HQ (2.50 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. The build material is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.
